spell_tooltip.description: Increases the range of your Demonic Gateway by 20 yards, and reduces the cast time by 30%. Reduces the time between how often players can take your Demonic Gateway by 30 sec.

Replaces Havoc.

Curses the ground with a demonic bane, causing all of your single target spells to also strike targets marked with the bane for  60% of the damage dealt. Lasts 10 sec.
Chaos Bolt creates a 5 yd wide eruption of Felfire under the target, reducing movement speed by 50% and reducing all healing received by 25% on all enemies within the fissure. Lasts 6 sec.
Your next Imp, Voidwalker, Incubus, Succubus, Felhunter, or Felguard Summon spell is free and has its casting time reduced by 90%.
All single-target damage done by you and your minions grants you and your pet shadowy shields that absorb 3% of the damage dealt, up to 10% of maximum health.

Increases your movement speed by 70%, but also damages you for 3% of your maximum health every 1 sec. Movement impairing effects may not reduce you below 100% of normal movement speed. Lasts until canceled.
Reduces the cooldown of Fel Domination by 60 sec.

Your Soul Leech absorption now passively recharges at a rate of 0.2% of maximum health every 1 sec, and may now absorb up to 10% of maximum health.

Increases your armor by 90%.
Reduces the damage dealt by Burning Rush by 10%. Burning Rush increases your movement speed by an additional 20%.

Summons a Demonic Circle for 15 min. Cast Demonic Circle: Teleport to teleport to its location and remove all movement slowing effects.

You also learn:

 Demonic Circle: Teleport
Teleports you to your Demonic Circle and removes all movement slowing effects.
Horrifies an enemy target into fleeing, incapacitating for 3 sec and healing you for 20% of maximum health.

Increases the attack speed of your primary pet by 5%. 

Increases Grimoire of Sacrifice damage by 10%.
Using Demonic Circle: Teleport or your Demonic Gateway reduces all damage you take by 4% for 10 sec.

Increases the damage done by your primary pet by 5%. 

Increases Grimoire of Sacrifice damage by 10%.
Your Healthstone heals you for an additional 10% of your maximum health. Any party or raid member using a Healthstone also heals you for that amount.
Creates a demonic gateway between two locations. Activating the gateway transports the user to the other gateway. Each player can use a Demonic Gateway only once per 90 sec.
Sacrifices 20% of your current health to shield you for 200% of the sacrificed health plus an additional 193,692 for 20 sec. Usable while suffering from control impairing effects.
Unending Resolve reduces damage taken by an additional 15%.
Stuns all enemies within 10 yds for 3 sec.
Reduces the cooldown of Dark Pact by 15 sec.
Immolate damage increased by 40%.
Incinerate damage increased by 20%.
Reduces the cooldown of Shadowfury by 15 sec and increases its radius by 2 yards.
Reduces the cast time of Soulstone and Create Healthstone by 50%.

Your spells have a 5% increased chance to deal a critical strike.

You gain 10% more of the Critical Strike stat from all sources.
Soul Leech also heals you for 15% and your pet for 100% of the absorption it grants.

20% of all damage you take is taken by your demon pet instead. 

While Grimoire of Sacrifice is active, your Stamina is increased by 5%.

Healthstones you conjure for yourself are now Demonic Healthstones and can be used multiple times in combat. Demonic Healthstones cannot be traded.

 Demonic Healthstone
Instantly restores 35% health. 60 sec cooldown.
Every Soul Shard you spend has a 5% chance to be refunded.

Consumes a Soul Shard, unlocking the hidden power of your spells.

Demonic Circle: Teleport: Increases your movement speed by 50% and makes you immune to snares and roots for 6 sec.

Demonic Gateway: Can be cast instantly.

Drain Life: Gain an absorb shield equal to the amount of healing done for 30 sec. This shield cannot exceed 30% of your maximum health.

Health Funnel: Restores 140% more health and reduces the damage taken by your pet by 30% for 10 sec.

Healthstone: Increases the healing of your Healthstone by 30% and increases your maximum health by 20% for 12 sec.

Triggers an explosion on the target, dealing 205,736 Fire damage.

Reduces the cast time of your next Incinerate or Chaos Bolt by 30% for 10 sec.

Generates 5 Soul Shard Fragments.
Conflagrate reduces the cast time of your next Incinerate, Chaos Bolt, or Soul Fire by 30%. Maximum 2 charges.

Calls down a rain of hellfire the target location, dealing 385,176 Fire damage over 6.6 sec to enemies in the area.

This spell is cast at a selected location.
Conflagrate increases your Wither, Incinerate, and Conflagrate damage to the target by 25% for 8 sec.

Increases your critical strike chance by 3%.

Physical attacks against you have a 25% chance to make your next Incinerate instant cast. This effect can only occur once every 6 sec.
Marks a target with Havoc for 15 sec, causing your single target spells to also strike the Havoc victim for 60% of the damage dealt.
Rain of Fire damage is increased by 20% and its Soul Shard cost is reduced by 1.
Backdraft increases the damage of your next Chaos Bolt by 5% and increases the critical strike chance of your next Incinerate or Soul Fire by 35%.
Each time your spells duplicate from Havoc, gain 1% increased damage for 6 sec. Stacks up to 5 times.
Increases the damage of Wither by 25% and its duration by 3 sec.

Blasts a target for 291,807 Shadowflame damage, gaining 100% critical strike chance on targets that have 30% or less health.

Restores 1 Soul Shard and refunds a charge if the target dies within 5 sec.
Increases the damage dealt by your spells and your demon by 3%.
Chaos Bolt, Shadowburn, and Incinerate deal 5% increased damage to targets afflicted by Wither.
Increases the damage of Shadowburn by 20%. The critical strike chance of Shadowburn is increased by an additional 50% when damaging a target that is at or below 30% health.
Conflagrate and Shadowburn have a 50% chance to guarantee your next cast of the ability to critically strike, and increase its damage by your critical strike chance.
Increases the damage done by your Fire spells by 2% and reduces the cast time of your Incinerate spell by 20%.

Summons an Infernal from the Twisting Nether, impacting for 48,325 Fire damage and stunning all enemies in the area for 2 sec.

The Infernal will serve you for 30 sec, dealing 48,640 damage to all nearby enemies every 1.7 sec and generating 1 Soul Shard Fragment every 1 sec.
Incinerate now also hits all enemies near your target for 25% damage.
Chaos Bolt and Shadowburn increases the damage you deal to the target by 5% for 7 sec.
Summon Infernal increases the damage of your next 8 casts of Chaos Bolt by 25% or your next 8 casts of Rain of Fire by 35%.
Chaos Bolt consumes up to 5 sec of Wither's damage over time effect on your target, instantly dealing that much damage.
Increases the critical strike chance of your Destruction spells by 5%.
Every 15 Soul Shards spent grants Ritual of Ruin, making your next Chaos Bolt or Rain of Fire consume no Soul Shards and have its cast time reduced by 50%.
Increases the critical strike damage of your Destruction spells by 5%.
Increases the damage of Chaos Bolt by 10% and reduces its cast time by 0.5 sec.

Chaos Bolt and Rain of Fire increase the damage of your next 2 Incinerates by 15%. Shadowburn increases the damage of your next Incinerate by 15%.

Stacks up to 6 times.
Ritual of Ruin requires 5 less Soul Shards spent.
Chaos Bolt, Rain of Fire, and Shadowburn always gain at least 70% of the maximum benefit from your Mastery: Chaotic Energies.

Consuming Ritual of Ruin summons an Overfiend for 8 sec.

 Summon Overfiend
Generates 1 Soul Shard Fragment every 1 sec and casts Chaos Bolt at 80% effectiveness at its summoner's target.
Incinerate now generates 100% additional Soul Shard Fragments.

Bestows a vile malediction upon the target, burning the sinew and muscle of its host, dealing 60,234 Shadowflame damage immediately and an additional 860,912 Shadowflame damage over 21 sec.

Periodic damage generates 1 Soul Shard Fragment and has a 50% chance to generate an additional 1 on critical strikes.

Replaces Immolate.
Fire damage dealt by your spells and abilities is increased by 4% and your Fire spells gain 10% more critical strike chance from all sources.

Spending Soul Shards on damaging spells will further corrupt enemies affected by your Wither, increasing its stack count by 1.

Each time Wither gains a stack it has a chance to collapse, consuming a stack every 1 sec to deal 140,974 Shadowflame damage to its host until 1 stack remains.
Shadow damage dealt by your spells and abilities is increased by 4% and your Shadow spells gain 10% more critical strike chance from all sources.
While Unending Resolve is active, enemies within 30 yds are affected by Curse of Tongues and Curse of Weakness at 100% effectiveness.
Wither damage increased 20%. When Wither gains a stack from Blackened Soul, it has a chance to gain an additional stack.
Dark Pact heals you for 130,438 every 1 sec while active.

Wither damage increased by 25%.

Blackened Soul deals 2% increased damage per stack of Wither.

After Wither reaches 8 stacks or when its host reaches 20% health, Wither deals 140,974 Shadowflame damage to its host every 1 sec until 1 stack remains.

When Blackened Soul deals damage, you have a chance to gain 2 stacks of Flashpoint.

Critical strike damage dealt by Wither is increased by 10%. 

Wither has a chance to gain a stack when it critically strikes. Stacks gained this way do not activate Blackened Soul.

Dark magic erupts from you and corrupts your soul for 20 sec, causing enemies suffering from your Wither to take 301,761 Shadowflame damage and increase its stack count by 6.

While corrupted your Haste is increased by 8% and spending Soul Shards on damaging spells grants 1 additional stack of Wither.
Your next Imp, Voidwalker, Incubus, Succubus, Felhunter, or Felguard Summon spell is free and has its casting time reduced by 90%.

Increases your movement speed by 70%, but also damages you for 3% of your maximum health every 1 sec. Movement impairing effects may not reduce you below 100% of normal movement speed. Lasts until canceled.
Reduces the cooldown of Fel Domination by 60 sec.

When Soul Leech absorbs damage, 10% of damage taken is absorbed and spread out over 5 sec.

Reduces damage taken by 3.0%.
Reduces the damage dealt by Burning Rush by 10%. Burning Rush increases your movement speed by an additional 20%.

Grants access to the following abilities:

Curse of Tongues:
Forces the target to speak in Demonic, increasing the casting time of all spells by 30% for 1 min.

Curses: A warlock can only have one Curse active per target.

Curse of Exhaustion:
Reduces the target's movement speed by 50% for 12 sec.

Curses: A warlock can only have one Curse active per target.

Summons a Demonic Circle for 15 min. Cast Demonic Circle: Teleport to teleport to its location and remove all movement slowing effects.

You also learn:

 Demonic Circle: Teleport
Teleports you to your Demonic Circle and removes all movement slowing effects.
Horrifies an enemy target into fleeing, incapacitating for 3 sec and healing you for 20% of maximum health.

Increases the attack speed of your primary pet by 5%. 

Increases Grimoire of Sacrifice damage by 10%.

Increases the damage done by your primary pet by 5%. 

Increases Grimoire of Sacrifice damage by 10%.
Your Healthstone heals you for an additional 10% of your maximum health. Any party or raid member using a Healthstone also heals you for that amount.
Increases the amount of damage required to break your fear effects by 60%.
Creates a demonic gateway between two locations. Activating the gateway transports the user to the other gateway. Each player can use a Demonic Gateway only once per 90 sec.
Sacrifices 20% of your current health to shield you for 200% of the sacrificed health plus an additional 193,692 for 20 sec. Usable while suffering from control impairing effects.
Unending Resolve reduces damage taken by an additional 15%.
Stuns all enemies within 10 yds for 3 sec.
Reduces the cooldown of Dark Pact by 15 sec.
Incinerate damage increased by 20%.
Slows enemies in a 12 yard cone in front of you by 70% for 6 sec.
Reduces the cast time of Soulstone and Create Healthstone by 50%.

Your spells have a 5% increased chance to deal a critical strike.

You gain 10% more of the Critical Strike stat from all sources.

Your primary pets gain a bonus effect.

Imp: Successful Singe Magic casts grant the target 4% damage reduction for 5 sec.

Voidwalker: Reduces the cooldown of Shadow Bulwark by 30 sec.

Felhunter: Reduces the cooldown of Devour Magic by 5 sec.

Sayaad: Reduces the cooldown of Seduction by 10 sec and causes the target to walk faster towards the demon.
Attacks received that deal at least 5% of your health decrease Unending Resolve's cooldown by 10 sec. Cannot occur more than once every 20 sec.
Soul Leech also heals you for 8% and your pet for 50% of the absorption it grants.
Reduces the chance you will be critically struck by 4%. All damage your primary demon takes is reduced by 15%.

Healthstones you conjure for yourself are now Demonic Healthstones and can be used multiple times in combat. Demonic Healthstones cannot be traded.

 Demonic Healthstone
Instantly restores 35% health. 60 sec cooldown.

Consumes a Soul Shard, unlocking the hidden power of your spells.

Demonic Circle: Teleport: Increases your movement speed by 50% and makes you immune to snares and roots for 6 sec.

Demonic Gateway: Can be cast instantly.

Drain Life: Gain an absorb shield equal to the amount of healing done for 30 sec. This shield cannot exceed 30% of your maximum health.

Health Funnel: Restores 140% more health and reduces the damage taken by your pet by 30% for 10 sec.

Healthstone: Increases the healing of your Healthstone by 30% and increases your maximum health by 20% for 12 sec.

Grants access to the following abilities:

 Demonbolt
Send the fiery soul of a fallen demon at the enemy, causing 269,925 Shadowflame damage.

 Demonic Core
When your Wild Imps expend all of their energy or are imploded, you have a 10% chance to absorb their life essence, granting you a stack of Demonic Core. 

When your summoned Dreadstalkers fade away, you have a 100% chance to absorb their life essence, granting you a stack of Demonic Core.

Demonic Core reduces the cast time of Demonbolt by 100%. Maximum 4 stacks.
Demonic forces suck all of your Wild Imps toward the target, and then cause them to violently explode, dealing 42,176 Shadowflame damage to all enemies within 8 yards.
Summons 2 ferocious Dreadstalkers to attack the target for 12 sec.

Summoning a Wild Imp has a 15% chance to summon a Imp Gang Boss instead. An Imp Gang Boss deals 50% additional damage. 

Implosions from Imp Gang Boss deal 50% increased damage.
Implosion deals 10% increased damage. Consuming a Demonic Core has a chance to summon a Wild Imp.
When your Dreadstalkers charge into battle, their Dreadbite attack now hits all targets within 8 yards and deals 10% more damage.
Your Dreadstalkers' attacks have a 10% chance to trigger an additional Dreadbite.

Teaches your primary Felguard the following ability:

 Soul Strike
Strike into the soul of the enemy, dealing 45,571 Shadow damage.
Infuse your Felguard with demonic strength and command it to charge your target and unleash a Felstorm that will deal 300% increased damage.
Increases the critical strike chance of your Wild Imp's Fel Firebolt by 15%.
Soul Strike deals 20% increased damage and generates a Soul Shard.
Your Felguard deals 20% more damage and takes 10% less damage.
Dreadbite causes the target to take 20% additional Shadowflame damage from your spell and abilities for the next 12 sec.
Instantly sacrifice up to 2 Wild Imps, generating 2 charges of Demonic Core that cause Demonbolt to deal 30% additional damage.

Summon a Demonic Tyrant to increase the duration of your Dreadstalkers, Vilefiend, Felguard, and up to 10 of your Wild Imps by 15 sec. Your Demonic Tyrant increases the damage of affected demons by 15%, while damaging your target.

Summons a Felguard who attacks the target for 17 sec that deals 125% increased damage.

This Felguard will stun and interrupt their target when summoned.

Hand of Gul'dan has a 15% chance to burn its target for 87,016 additional Shadowflame damage every 2 sec for 6 sec.

If this effect is reapplied, any remaining damage will be added to the new Umbral Blaze.
Summon Demonic Tyrant empowers 5 additional Wild Imps and deals 10% increased damage for each demon he empowers.
Shadow Bolt has a 20% chance to make your next Call Dreadstalkers cost 2 fewer Soul Shards and have no cast time.
Damage dealt by Grimoire: Felguard is increased by an additional 10% and you gain a Demonic Core when Grimoire: Felguard ends.

When Demonbolt consumes a Demonic Core it inflicts impending doom upon the target, dealing 243,514 Shadow damage to enemies within 10 yds of its target after 20 sec or when removed. Damage is reduced beyond 8 targets.

Each Soul Shard spent on Hand of Gul'dan reduces the duration of Doom by 1 sec.
Hand of Gul'dan has a 15% chance to cast a second time on your target for free.
Summon a Vilefiend to fight for you for the next 15 sec.
Your Felguard deals 20% additional damage. Soul Strike now deals 25% of its damage to nearby enemies.
When Doom expires, you have a 30% chance to generate a Demonic Core.
Your Dreadstalkers deal 50% increased damage while your Vilefiend is active.
Increases your primary Felguard's critical strike chance equal to 30% of your critical strike chance.
When Doom expires, you have a chance to summon a Doomguard that casts 5 Doom Bolts before departing. Each Doom Bolt deals 234,926 Shadow damage.

Your Summon Vilefiend becomes Summon Gloomhound and learns the following ability:

 Gloom Slash
Tooth and claw are drenched in malignant shadow magic, causing the Gloomhound's melee attacks to deal an additional 25,184 Shadow damage.
Increases the attack speed of your Dreadstalkers by 10% and their critical strike chance by 15%.
Enemies damaged by your Overlord have their souls cloven, increasing damage taken by you and your pets by 5% for 15 sec.

Demonic Art increases the damage of your next Chaos Bolt, Rain of Fire, or Shadowburn by 100% and reduces its cast time by 50%.

Casting Chaos Bolt reduces the duration of Diabolic Ritual by 1 additional sec.

Mother of Chaos empowers your next Incinerate to become Infernal Bolt.

 Infernal Bolt
Hurl a bolt enveloped in the infernal flames of the abyss, dealing 439,690 Fire damage to your enemy target and generating 2 Soul Shards.
You always gain the benefit of Soulburn when casting Demonic Circle: Teleport, increasing your movement speed by 50% and making you immune to snares and roots for 6 sec.
Summon Infernal grants Diabolic Ritual and reduces its duration by 3 sec.
Unending Resolve heals you for 30% of your maximum health over 10 sec.
Fire damage increased by 2% and damage dealt by your demons is increased by 2%.
Summon Infernal becomes empowered, dealing 40% increased damage. When your Summon Infernal ends, it fragments into two smaller Infernals at 50% effectiveness that lasts 10 sec.
Enemies marked by your Havoc take 7% increased damage from your single target spells.

Summoning a Pit Lord causes your next Chaos Bolt to become Ruination.

 Ruination
Call down a demon-infested meteor from the depths of the Twisting Nether, dealing 1.3 million Chaos damage on impact to all enemies within 8 yds of the target and summoning 1 Diabolic Imp.

Damage is further increased by your critical strike chance and is reduced beyond 8 targets.
